item.title: How to Control Impulse Spending and Master Your Money
item.description: If you want to get a handle on impulse spending, it all boils down to one simple thing: creating a pause. You have to build a little space between the urge to buy and the moment you actually click “purchase.” That moment of hesitation is your secret weapon against emotional spending and slick marketing. Itâ€™s what lets you sync your spending with your real financial goals, not just your in-the-moment wants.
